  Learning new things daily

Instapaper

Today’s Easy Things is a new personal bookmarking service called Instapaper. There really is not much to the service, but it has become a very important tool for me.

Instapaper has one very simple goal: enable users to easily bookmark a list of articles they would like to read at a later date. To use the service, you simply click a link on your bookmark toolbar and the article title and link are sent to Instapaper.

Later, when you have some free time, you simply navigate back to Instapaper and you are presented with your list of links.

Posted on Feb 25, 2008 and tagged as easy-things
